LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.label: blinding
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.description: A cutter will ritualistically blind a target. The audience will watch as the cutter gives a speech, cuts out both of the target's eyes, and says some closing words. The target will be left bleeding and need immediate medical care.
LanguageData.Conversion.label: 개종의식
LanguageData.Conversion.description: Try to persuade someone into joining your ideoligion.
LanguageData.DateRitualConsumable.label: christmas tree party
LanguageData.DateRitualConsumable.description: A celebratory gathering for your colonists to have fun. A leader will give an encouraging speech, then everyone will socialize for a while.
LanguageData.Execution.label: public execution
LanguageData.Execution.description: An executioner will publicly execute a prisoner. The executioner will give a short speech, execute the prisoner by cutting, and say some closing words. Spectating slaves will become afraid and intimidated, and colonists will feel exhilarated or disgusted depending on their beliefs.
LanguageData.Festival.label: social festival
LanguageData.Festival.description: A celebratory gathering for your colonists to have fun. A leader will give an encouraging speech, then everyone will socialize for a while.
LanguageData.Funeral.label: funeral
LanguageData.Funeral.description: A gathering that occurs around a believer's grave after they die and are buried. If the body is destroyed, an empty grave can be used. Slaves don't get funerals.
LanguageData.FuneralNoCorpse.label: funeral (no corpse)
LanguageData.FuneralNoCorpse.description: A gathering that occurs around a believer's grave after they die and are buried. If the body is destroyed, an empty grave can be used. Slaves don't get funerals.
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.label: gladiator duel
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.description: A duel between prisoners or slaves. The organizer will give a speech to excite the crowd, then the duelists will fight until one of them falls or time runs out. If weapons are in the arena, the duelists will pick up and use them.
LanguageData.LeaderSpeech.label: 지도자 연설
LanguageData.LeaderSpeech.description: A rousing speech intended to improve morale. Colonists will gather, and the leader will speak for a few hours. If all goes well, listeners will feel inspired, and gain respect for the leader. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage.
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.label: 상흔 문신
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.description: A ritualistic scarring where a cutter carves ideoligious symbols into a target. The audience will watch as the cutter gives a speech, performs the cutting, then says some finishing words.
LanguageData.TreeConnection.label: tree connection ritual
LanguageData.TreeConnection.description: A connector will connect with a Gauranlen tree. The connector will touch the Gauranlen tree and speak to it, forming a permanent link. Others gather in a circle to watch and add force to the ritual.
LanguageData.Trial.label: 재판
LanguageData.Trial.description: 끔찍한 범죄를 저지른 용의자를 고발하기 위한 재판입니다. 관전자들은 원고와 피고의 엎치락뒤치락 하는 논쟁을 듣고, 고발이 사실인지 판단할 것입니다. 유죄가 선고된다면, 피의자를 수감 및 추방, 처형을 통한 불이익이 발생하지 않습니다. 판결의 결과는 피고와 원고의 사교적 능력치 뿐 아니라 관전자의 수에도 영향을 받습니다.
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.label: 재판
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.description: 끔찍한 범죄를 저지른 용의자를 고발하기 위한 재판입니다. 관전자들은 원고와 피고의 엎치락뒤치락 하는 논쟁을 듣고, 고발이 사실인지 판단할 것입니다. 유죄가 선고된다면, 피의자를 수감 및 추방, 처형을 통한 불이익이 발생하지 않습니다. 판결의 결과는 피고와 원고의 사교적 능력치 뿐 아니라 관전자의 수에도 영향을 받습니다.
LanguageData.TrialPrisoner.label: 재판
LanguageData.TrialPrisoner.description: 끔찍한 범죄를 저지른 용의자를 고발하기 위한 재판입니다. 관전자들은 원고와 피고의 엎치락뒤치락 하는 논쟁을 듣고, 고발이 사실인지 판단할 것입니다. 유죄가 선고된다면, 피의자를 수감 및 추방, 처형을 통한 불이익이 발생하지 않습니다. 판결의 결과는 피고와 원고의 사교적 능력치 뿐 아니라 관전자의 수에도 영향을 받습니다.
